How to package:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UZX5kH72Yx4
* Have to open command prompt as administrator 

How to re-create the virtual env:
python -m venv env 
env\scripts\activate
pip install -r requirements.txt

Pyinstaller:
(run on an administrative command prompt )
PyInstaller --onefile main.py 

pyinstaller --clean --onefile -w main.py 

** -w means windowed
